Name: Tawny-Tini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Port combines wonderfully with the maple syrup and is fortified by grainy vodka to produce a toffee-flavoured cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Tawny-Tini contains 230 calories
